desc: This is a team-taught course in which students build on the process of perception and description encountered in Interdisciplinary Fine Arts 174, Exploring the Arts, examine interpretation and evaluation and begin the synthesis process, a major focus of the Senior Studies course. Students attend a variety of music, theater, dance and art events. Performance/exhibit fee required. Counts toward the major: Interdisciplinary Fine Arts.
name: Perspective-The Arts
title: Perspectives on the Arts
